translation.text: The God-conscious being is himself the Formless Lord.

melody.description: Gauri creates a mood where the listener is encouraged to strive harder in order to achieve an objective. However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. This therefore creates the atmosphere where the listener is encouraged, but still prevented from becoming arrogant and self-important.

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਗਿਆਨੀ ਕੀ ਸੋਭਾ ਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਗਿਆਨੀ ਬਨੀ ॥

translation.text: The glory of the God-conscious being belongs to the God-conscious being alone.

transliteration.text: braham giānī kī sōbhā braham giānī banī .

melody.description: Gauri creates a mood where the listener is encouraged to strive harder in order to achieve an objective. Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਤਿਸੁ ਭਗਉਤੀ ਕੀ ਮਤਿ ਊਤਮ ਹੋਵੈ ॥

translation.text: The wisdom of such a Bhagaautee becomes supreme.

However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. This therefore creates the atmosphere where the listener is encouraged, but still prevented from becoming arrogant and self-important.

text: ਉਸੁ ਪੰਡਿਤ ਕੈ ਉਪਦੇਸਿ ਜਗੁ ਜੀਵੈ ॥

However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. text: ਸੋ ਪੰਡਿਤੁ ਫਿਰਿ ਜੋਨਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ॥

translation.text: Such a Pandit is not cast into the womb of reincarnation again.

However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. translation.text: The Beej Mantra, the Seed Mantra, is spiritual wisdom for everyone.

text: ਚਹੁ ਵਰਨਾ ਮਹਿ ਜਪੈ ਕੋਊ ਨਾਮੁ ॥

However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. translation.text: And yet, rare are those who attain it, in the Company of the Holy.

translation.text: Even beasts, ghosts and the stone-hearted are saved.

translation.text: The Naam is the panacea, the remedy to cure all ills.

translation.text: Singing the Glory of God is the embodiment of bliss and emancipation.

text: ਕਾਹੂ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਕਿਤੈ ਨ ਪਾਈਐ ਧਰਮਿ ॥

translation.text: It cannot be obtained by any religious rituals.

transliteration.text: kāhū jugat kitai n pāīai dharam .

However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. text: ਨਾਨਕ ਤਿਸੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਜਿਸੁ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਧੁਰਿ ਕਰਮਿ ॥੫॥

translation.text: O Nanak, he alone obtains it, whose karma is so pre-ordained. ||5||

text: ਜਿਸ ਕੈ ਮਨਿ ਪਾਰਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਕਾ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ॥
